content.rendered:
Directed by Meghna Gulzar

Written by Meghna Gulzar

Cast Deepika Padukone (Malti Aggarwal). Vikrant Massey (Amol Dwivedi). Madhurjeet Sarghi (Archana Bajaj). Payal Nair (Shiraz Jamshed). Vaibhavi Upadhyaya (Minakshi). Geeta Agrawal Sharma (Malti’s Mother (as Geeta Agarwal)). Vishal Dahiya (Basheer Shaikh ‘Babbu’). Ankit Bisht (Rajesh). Satish Sharma (Defence Lawyer). Anand Tiwari (Archana’s Husband). Ipshita Chakraborty Singh (Parveen Shaikh). Devas Dixit (Manish). Delzad Hiwale (Rohit). Sanjay Gurbaxani (Dr. Kulmeet Singh). Annapurna Soni (Deepa). Suhani Popli (Chitra). Chittaranjan Tripathy (Sub Inspector Shankar Shukla). Sharvari Deshpande (Alka). Pallavi Batra (Hardeep Kaur). Micky Makhija (Solicitor General). Monika Sharma (Lady cop). Bhasha Sumbli (Babbu’s Sister 1). Srishti Wadhwani (Babbu’s Sister 2). Gita Guha (DCP Amrita Rai). Sakshi Benipuri (Mahira Shaikh). Sunny Gill Ambersariya (Driver Anoop Singh (as Sunny Gill)).Baharul Islam. Anjana Om Kashyap (Aaj Tak News Anchor). TejInder Singh Khamkha (Chhaaya Volunteer). Tahura Mansuri (Archana’s Daughter (credit only)). Himanshu Sharma (Theater Activist). Jaspal Sharma (Rickshaw puller). Naman Sharma (Theater activist)

Languages Hindi

Producers Ankita Chowfin. Meghna Gulzar. Deepika Padukone. Zahoor Qadir. Govind Singh Sandhu. Ravi Sarin. Prafull Sharma. Yogiraj Shetty. Ravi Tiwari

Production Absolute Production. Fox STAR Studio. KA Production
